import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; export default function (props) { const today = new Date(); const now = `${today.getDate()} / ${today.getMonth()} / ${today.getFullYear()}` return (

{props.name}

@{props.username}

{props.description}
{`${today.getHours()} : ${today.getMinutes()}`} {now}
Follow Tweet
) }
